substitution.copyText: " Ophel. You are keen, my lord, you are keen. | Ham. It would cost you a groaning to take off mine edge. | Ophel. Still worse and worse. | " Ham. So you mistake your husbands. substitution.copyText: Ham. He poisons him i'th Garden for his estate, his name's Gonzago, the story is extant, and written in very choice Italian: you shall see anon how the murtherer gets the love of Gonzago's Wife.

substitution.copyText: King. Give my some light, away.
substitution.amendedText: King. Give me some lights, away.

substitution.copyText: The Hart ungalled go play, | For some must watch whilst some must sleep, | Thus runs the world away.
